actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels

official_title: A bill to stabilize domestic oil prices by creating an independent corporation to buy and sell crude oil and petroleum products.

summary.text: Creates and charters the Oil Trading Corporation to trade in crude oil and petroleum products (in order to reduce the potential for supply disruptions and rapid price increases). Prohibits the Corporation from engaging in crude oil exploration, development, or refinement.

titles.title: A bill to stabilize domestic oil prices by creating an independent corporation to buy and sell crude oil and petroleum products.
